verses.kjv: Preserve me, O God: for in thee do I put my trust.
verses.ct: Protect me, God, because I place my trust in you.

verses.kjv: O my soul, thou hast said unto the LORD, Thou art my Lord: my goodness extendeth not to thee;
verses.ct: I have told the LORD, 'You are my Lord; apart from you, I have nothing good.'

verses.kjv: But to the saints that are in the earth, and to the excellent, in whom is all my delight.
verses.ct: As for the faithful people in the land, they are the noble ones who bring me all my joy.

verses.kjv: Their sorrows shall be multiplied that hasten after another god: their drink offerings of blood will I not offer, nor take up their names into my lips.
verses.ct: Those who chase after other gods will only pile up their suffering. I will not pour out their blood offerings or even speak the names of their gods.

verses.kjv: The LORD is the portion of mine inheritance and of my cup: thou maintainest my lot.
verses.ct: The LORD is my share and my provision — you secure my future.

verses.kjv: The lines are fallen unto me in pleasant places; yea, I have a goodly heritage.
verses.ct: The boundaries of my life have been drawn in beautiful places; yes, I have received a wonderful inheritance.

verses.kjv: I will bless the LORD, who hath given me counsel: my reins also instruct me in the night seasons.
verses.ct: I will praise the LORD, who has guided me; even during the night, my deepest thoughts direct me.

verses.kjv: I have set the LORD always before me: because he is at my right hand, I shall not be moved.
verses.ct: I keep the LORD constantly in front of me; with him at my right side, I will never be shaken.

verses.kjv: Therefore my heart is glad, and my glory rejoiceth: my flesh also shall rest in hope.
verses.ct: That is why my heart is happy and my whole being celebrates — even my body will rest securely.

verses.kjv: For thou wilt not leave my soul in hell; neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.
verses.ct: Because you will not abandon my soul to the grave, and you will not let your Holy One experience decay.

verses.kjv: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.
verses.ct: You will reveal to me the road to life; complete joy is found in your presence, and endless pleasures are at your right hand.
